DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Performed Study Activity Status Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: One of a set of conditions that a study subject must meet in order to participate in a study. A coded value specifying the phase in the lifecycle of a performed activity. EXAMPLE(S): For a lab test, this would be the condition or stage in the lifecycle of the test (e.g., "completed", "canceled", etc.).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Performed Study Activity Status Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
